1.name: Strange Interlude
1.description: After Nina Leeds finds out that insanity runs in her husband's family, she has a love child with a handsome doctor and lets her husband believes the child is his.

2.name: One Way Passage
2.description: A terminally ill woman and a debonair murderer facing execution meet and fall in love on a trans-Pacific crossing, each without knowing the other's secret.

3.name: Red Dust
3.description: The owner of a rubber plantation becomes involved with the new wife of one of his employees.

4.name: Freaks
4.description: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

5.name: Scarface
5.description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

6.name: Jewel Robbery
6.description: A gentleman thief charms a Viennese baron's wife and also conducts a daring daylight robbery of a jewellers.

7.name: Penguin Pool Murder
7.description: Shady stockbroker and abusive husband Gerald Parker is found dead in the penguin pool of a NYC aquarium after being knocked cold by his wife's boyfriend.

8.name: Tarzan the Ape Man
8.description: A trader and his daughter set off in search of the fabled graveyard of the elephants in deepest Africa, only to encounter a wild man raised by apes.

9.name: Grand Hotel
9.description: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

10.name: The Mummy
10.description: A resurrected Egyptian mummy stalks a beautiful woman he believes to be the reincarnation of his lover and bride.

11.name: Ghost Valley
11.description: Jerry Long and Jane Worth are heirs to an abandoned mining town. Judge Drake knows there is gold there and wants them to sell. He plans to scare Jane and has hired Jerry, not knowing his ...                See full summary »

12.name: The Most Dangerous Game
12.description: An insane hunter arranges for a ship to be wrecked on an island where he can indulge in some sort of hunting and killing of the passengers.

13.name: Vampyr
13.description: A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.

14.name: Island of Lost Souls
14.description: An obsessed scientist conducts profane experiments in evolution, eventually establishing himself as the self-styled demigod to a race of mutated, half-human abominations.

15.name: The Old Dark House
15.description: Seeking shelter from a storm, five travelers are in for a bizarre and terrifying night when they stumble upon the Femm family estate.

16.name: White Zombie
16.description: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

17.name: The Sign of the Cross
17.description: A Roman soldier becomes torn between his love for a Christian woman and his loyalty to Emperor Nero.

18.name: Trouble in Paradise
18.description: A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.

19.name: A Farewell to Arms
19.description: An American ambulance driver and an English nurse fall in love in Italy during World War I.

20.name: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
20.description: Wrongly convicted James Allen serves in the intolerable conditions of a southern chain gang, which later comes back to haunt him.

21.name: Blonde Venus
21.description: A cabaret singer takes up with a millionaire to pay for her gravely ill husband's operation.

22.name: Law and Order
22.description: A lawman sets out to tame Tombstone, Arizona.

23.name: Call Her Savage
23.description: Sexy Texas gal storms her way through life, brawling and boozing until her luck runs out, forcing her to learn the errors of her ways.

24.name: Horse Feathers
24.description: Quincy Adams Wagstaff, the new president of Huxley University, accidentally hires bumblers Baravelli and Pinky to help his school win the big football game against the rival Darwin University.

25.name: The Bitter Tea of General Yen
25.description: A Chinese warlord and an engaged Christian missionary fall in love.

26.name: Red-Headed Woman
26.description: Lillian relentlessly attempts to seduce a married man.

27.name: Murders in the Rue Morgue
27.description: A mad scientist seeks to mingle human blood with that of an ape, and resorts to kidnapping women for his experiments.

28.name: Bird of Paradise
28.description: A native girl falls for a visitor to her island, but she's chosen to be sacrificed to the volcano god.

29.name: Three on a Match
29.description: Although Vivian Revere is seemingly the most successful of a trio of reunited schoolmates, she throws it away by descending into a life of debauchery and drugs.

30.name: The Blood of a Poet
30.description: A young artist draws a face at a canvas on his easel. Suddenly the mouth on the drawing comes into life and starts talking. The artist tries to wipe it away with his hand, but when he looks...                See full summary »

31.name: Shanghai Express
31.description: A loose woman rediscovers a former lover during a dangerous train ride to Shanghai.

32.name: Forbidden
32.description: A librarian takes a cruise and falls for an unobtainable man, a district attorney married to a crippled woman.

33.name: What Price Hollywood?
33.description: The career of a waitress takes off when she meets an amiable drunken Hollywood director.

34.name: Merrily We Go to Hell
34.description: A drunken newspaperman is rescued from his alcoholic haze by an heiress whose love sobers him up and encourages him to write a play, but he lapses back into dipsomania.

35.name: Little Orphan Annie
35.description: Daddy Warbucks has to go on a long trip, leaving Annie alone. While wandering the street, Sandy leads Annie to discover Mickey, who is crying. Mickey's grandmother recently died, and he is ...                See full summary »

36.name: Number 17
36.description: A gang of thieves gather at a safe house following a robbery, but a detective is on their trail.

37.name: Night World
37.description: Story of the goings-on at a Prohibition-era nightclub.

38.name: Rain
38.description: A prostitute newly arrived in the South Pacific finds herself at odds with a stern missionary determined to save her soul.

39.name: The Blue Light
39.description: When the moon is full, young men die attempting to reach the mysterious blue light in the mountains.

40.name: As You Desire Me
40.description: Budapest bar entertainer Zara is a discontented alcoholic who is pursued by many men but lives with novelist Carl Salter. A strange man (Tony) shows up on Salter's estate claiming that Zara...                See full summary »

41.name: I Was Born, But...
41.description: Two young brothers throw a tantrum when they discover that their father isn't the most important man in his workplace.

42.name: No Man of Her Own
42.description: A con man on the run from the police falls for a librarian.

43.name: Rasputin and the Empress
43.description: A prince plots to kill the mad monk Rasputin for the good of the czar, the czarina and Russia.

44.name: Devil and the Deep
44.description: Man sets out for revenge after learning of his wife's affair.

45.name: A Bill of Divorcement
45.description: A man, Hilary Fairfield returns home after fifteen years in a mental asylum. However, he finds things are not the way they were when he left.

46.name: Arsène Lupin
46.description: A detective is tasked to capture an elusive thief called Arsene Lupin.

47.name: Love Me Tonight
47.description: A Parisian tailor finds himself posing as a baron in order to collect a sizeable bill from an aristocrat, only to fall in love with an aloof young princess.

48.name: One Hour with You
48.description: An unhappily married couple try to come between a happy one.

49.name: Hot Saturday
49.description: A pretty but virtuous small-town bank clerk is the victim of a vicious rumor from an unsuccessful suitor that she spent the night with a notorious womanizer.

50.name: Night After Night
50.description: A successful ex-boxer opens a high-class speakeasy in what once was the childhood home of a formerly rich society girl.
